HomePage.code2: This is a beta RC version, open to all users
HomePage.code3: Please, report any bugs or issues to Jeremie Bitsch

zipFile.label: Zip File
zipFile.helperText: Insert the zip file to process

consoleDisplay.label: The save button in the console allow to export the logs and share it with the development team.

appDropdownHelper.schema: Select the schema containing the project
appDropdownHelper.node_p_calc: Choose the pole layer to process
appDropdownHelper.input_uuidPole: Optional: pole UUID for ponctual processing

address_breakdown.description: This app aims to compile an address breakdown as an Excel file along with a map screenshot.

dfn_boundaries.description: This app generates an AGOL DFN boundaries layer in Postgres for client import.

gps_to_shp.description: This app compiles and sanitizes ungraded GPS surveys into SHP files suitable for HLD.

gps_to_postgres.description: This app imports new graded GPS surveys or appends them to existing tables.

gps_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh GPS import, erasing old data.

hld_to_kmz.description: This app produces KMZ mappings for each DFN's HLD.

hld_to_postgres.description: This app imports new HLD data or appends it to existing tables.

hld_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh HLD import, erasing old data.

node_quantities.description: This app extracts node AER/UG length quantities in feet.

hp_by_splits1.description: This app compiles HP data by L1 splitters within a node.
hp_by_splits1.update: Resolve an issue when addresses are empty.

poles_numbering.description: This app creates a pole ID field based on the leaflet order.

midspan_calculation.description: This app recalculates project midspans based on pole updates.

dfn_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by DFN.

node_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by Node.

pole_class_length_estimator.description: This app estimates missing pole classes and lengths by DFN.

extract_data_dp.description: This app extracts pole owner and HP data counts for DP.

import_to_db621.description: This app imports DFN design data to DB621 and performs auto snapshots.

update_db621.description: This app updates DFN attributes in DB621.

snapshots_from_db621.description: This app generates snapshots from DB621.

dfn_bounds_db621.description: This app imports, updates, or deletes DFN boundaries.

resolve_null_geom.description: This app removes null geometries from the Postgres database.

recover_from_version.description: This app recovers deleted data from versioning in the Postgres database.

change_table_ownership_uniq.description: This app changes table ownership and permissions from/to UNIQ in the Postgres database.

clean_table_ownership.description: This app cleans table ownership and permissions in the entire schema of the Postgres database.

postgres_versioning.description: This app enables versioning for untracked schemas and tables in Postgres.

gps_to_shp.description: This app compiles and sanitizes ungraded GPS surveys into SHP files suitable for HLD.

gps_to_postgres.description: This app imports new graded GPS surveys or appends them to existing tables.

gps_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh GPS import, erasing old data.

node_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by Node.

resolve_null_geom.description: This app removes null geometries from the Postgres database.

recover_from_version.description: This app recovers deleted data from versioning in the Postgres database.

extract_bom_summary.description: This app creates a BOM summary from a zip file containing AutoCAD extracted shapefiles.
